releaseNotes: Now you can choose a colour for habits from the colour picker
description:
Transform Your Life with Our Powerful Habit Tracking App!

Are you ready to take control of your life and become the best version of yourself? Look no further! Our app is your ultimate companion on your journey to forming and maintaining healthy habits, boosting productivity, and achieving self-improvement goals.

Here's what sets our app apart:

Effortless Habit Tracking:
Easily monitor your daily habits on the main screen, ensuring you stay focused on what matters most today. With a simple swipe, you can mark each habit as complete, making tracking a breeze.

Comprehensive Weekly Overview:
Get a bird's-eye view of all your habits and their weekly progress. Our app helps you visualize your achievements and areas that need improvement, keeping you on track for long-term success.

Track Your Habit History:
Gain valuable insights into your habit journey by reviewing your historical data. Watch as you make progress and transform into a better version of yourself over time.

Unlimited Habit Creation:
Unlike many habit trackers, our app allows you to create an unlimited number of habits. Whether you want to focus on fitness, mindfulness, or personal growth, we've got you covered.

Stunning New Widgets:
Exciting news! We've introduced four beautiful widgets to make sticking to your habits even more enjoyable and convenient. These widgets keep your habits front and center, ensuring you never lose sight of your goals.

Our app is optimized for those seeking habit trackers, routines, and self-help tools. Start your journey towards a healthier, more productive, and improved self today. Download now and watch your habits transform your life!
https://thefor.xyz/terms

developerResponse.body: Thanks for the review! I am glad the app is helpful!

reviews.review: You don’t know how many habit tracker apps I tried before finding this one. All I wanted was a place to track my habits and view my monthly progress without all the extra bells and whistles. Even better - there’s no constant barrage of prompts asking you to upgrade! This app is perfect and exactly what I was looking for. If you’re searching for a simple and aesthetically pleasing habit tracker, this is the app you want!
reviews.title: Perfectly Simple

developerResponse.body: Thank you for review! We are very happy that the app helps you 🥰❤️

reviews.review: As someone who is diagnosed with ADHD, I need to master routines so I don’t fall off track. I’ve tried so many productivity tools out there—I’ve made habit trackers on notion and even used other habit tracker apps on the appstore but they just weren’t effective. Finding this app though CHANGED the game for me. The UI is intuitive, simple, and it’s easier than ever for me to keep up with my daily/weekly routines. Couldn’t recommend enough!
reviews.title: Best habit tracker out there

developerResponse.body: Thanks for the review 🥰 do you mean icons on the habit names? You can use any emoji on the habit name at the moment

reviews.review: I’m looking for something simple to keep track of my habits. I’ve tried almost 10 apps. While I deleted all others instantly because they didn’t meet my requirements for a simple solution. This one stay and I love it. The color scheme is easy on the eyes. The way it works just what I wanted. It would be nice if they add cutes icons, but so far so good!
reviews.title: Simple yet efficient

developerResponse.body: Thank you for the kind words 🥰 It has a tick sound when you complete a habit. We will add more sounds in the future

reviews.review: I’ve tried many habit tracking apps, but I like this one the most— especially because of its simplicity. Would definitely recommend people. I wish that it has an option for completion sound when I complete a daily habit though.
reviews.title: Simple

developerResponse.body: Hi! Thanks for the kind words 🥰 We already have 4 kind of widgets. Please let me know if you cannot find them. I would be happy to help if that’s the case

reviews.review: Love this app, great and simple. Easy to use and I love that you can have as many tasks as you want which is rare for free apps. Would be AMAZING if there was a widget for the home screen to give you a look at what tasks you have left for the day and to keep them in your mind.
reviews.title: Please make a widget!

reviews.review: All I wanted from a habit tracker is for it to look clean and let me track as many things as I want for free. THIS IS BOTH. And there’s a cute widget I can put on my home screen as the cherry on top. Thank you so much to the creators of this app for making something simple and effective!
reviews.title: Amazing / UNLIMITED HABITS!!

developerResponse.body: Thank you 🥰 Happy that you loved it

reviews.review: Super simple, beautiful, no fuss, easy to navigate and figure out.  I spent all afternoon looking for the perfect habit tracker that didn’t involve a lot unnecessary things and was easy to figure out and this one was the best one so far.
reviews.title: Love it

reviews.review: Perfect, simple, well designed, thanks for sharing this :)
reviews.title: No extra junk!

developerResponse.body: Hi! Thanks for the review! Sorry that you experienced the issue 😕 Could you please dm us on instagram or twitter or at twitter@thefor.xyz? I would be happy to help. Could you please also try killing and opening the app and retry to subscribe?

reviews.review:
Nice simple app. 
I payed for an annual subscription but the app is still prompting me to pay. Hitting restore purchase does not help.  Unable to contact developer on their website.  Hopefully this issue will be fixed.
reviews.title: Nice app but subscription not working

developerResponse.body: Thanks for the review ❤️ Sure, we will create more widgets

reviews.review: App works perfectly, would love the option to see the month view for each habit as a widget!
reviews.title: More widgets please!

reviews.review: I tried many of the habit trackers and have found this one to be the best and the great thing about that is that you can track as many habits as you want for free. It does what you want it do, track habits, and allows lots of flexibility in how you track; daily, weekly, 3 times per week, etc… I like that you can color code and order the habits. I order for morning til nighttime. You can also have habits disappear off your list once completed. Of all the apps I tried this has the best options for tracking habits you do a certain amount of times in a week, instead of just once a day. I can keep my exercise streak alive 6 days a week and not worry about taking Sundays off and losing my streak. This app should be used by a lot more people as it’s better than so many of the other more expensive paid apps.
reviews.title: Fantastic Habit Tracker
